## Libraries & Reading in the data

Before getting started, we need to read in the necessary libraries and bring in the data

```{r}
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyverse)

bike_data <- read_csv(file='https://www4.stat.ncsu.edu/~online/datasets/SeoulBikeData.csv',show_col_types=FALSE)

head(bike_data)
```
